user_review: *BURGER WEEK* Aaaaaamaaaaazing. I was not expecting this burger to be as delicious as it was!! It was a fried buffalo chicken burger with ranch sauce &  cucumber with apple salad.. deeeelish! First time coming to this place and I would definitely go back ,however parking is such a hassle! It took us literally 20 minutes to find legal parking! But it was totaly worth it! The cocktails was really yummy and they have such a great alcohol menu! .. and the decor of this place is insanely beautiful! .. the staff was so so so friendly and very informative about their menu and you can totaly tell that they really do love some certain dishes and that says alot about the place! I'm excited to go back & try out some new things from their menu! ..

Restaurant Basterd was highly recommended by the concierge at our hotel, so even though it was a 20 minute cab ride, we decided to give it a try.  As it turns out, we were the only dinner patrons in the restaurant, and with good reason.  While the staff is wonderfully friendly, the food is pretty ordinary.  With more attention to the food, this place could be so much better.They have a full bar and offer an interesting variety of signature cocktails.

It is so refreshing when a new restaurant opens in the neighborhood. I tried it today and just loved it. The fish tacos are delicious and the California red wine really fine! Excellent ambiance as well and good service. They just need hotter hot sauces but then again I'm Pakistani so it's hard to satisfy my lust for heat!

Ok so I know this place recently opened but my first experience wasn't great. Though the decor was cute and the overall space inviting, the service was pretty bad. They literally ran out of food and we had to change our order twice. They also had limited non-dairy milk options making ordering coffee a bit difficult. The food itself was just ok. Had it been exceptional I could have ignored the issues associated with lack of inventory.

Went there recently for brunch with friends but the male server was more interested in flirting with two pretty women than serving customers. He also forgot to fill our glasses with water. Other than this, the food was good & fresh.
